physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Neovascularization of the right iris, total exudative retinal detachment, normal examination of the left eye, no evidence of inflammation in the right eye.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: No specified changes; only the findings as of this examination.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Full eye movements noted with right hypertropia and exotropia in primary gaze. The anterior segment of the right eye showed a clear cornea and an abnormally shallow anterior chamber.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Visual acuity remained unchanged from previous assessment.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: No evidence of tumor detected during examination.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient was free of tumor at this follow-up.
